PluginViewModel.Name: AML2OPCUA
PluginViewModel.Description: This AutomationML Editor plugin called 'AML2OPCUA' performs the mapping between AUTOMATIONML and OPC UA via a web interface to the online website of an existing implementation of FRAUNHOFER IOSB. A valid account is necessary.
PluginViewModel.Author: Kathrin Bott, Pascal Habiger and Armin Karle (Supervision: Prof. Rainer Drath) Hochschule Pforzheim
